dfs

Class DFSClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • dfs.DFSClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DFSClientInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DFSClient
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements DFSClientInterface
    This is the main thread of DFS client server. It contains a command line tool and methods to interact with DFS.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DFSClient()
      This constructor is used by default.
      DFSClient(int tmpClientPort, int tmpClientRegPort)
      This is a overload constructor for task task tracker to upload MapReduce result.
